Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.action

Class Action

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.action.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseTicketAction, BaseUnloadAction, DeleteAction, JsonParameterisedAction, NothingAction, SubmitAction, SymlinkAction
public abstract class Action extends Object
An action that can be performed as a result of the decision-making process

This is the information needed to perform an action. As a Shesmu program operates, it will instantiate new actions using and then put them in a set. If the same action is create multiple times, it should be de-duplicated using equals(Object) by the set. It will then attempt to complete each action and track the success of performing an action.

Creating this action should not perform it until {perform(ActionServices, Duration, boolean) is called. If the action is needs to be in contact with a remote system, that information must be baked into its constructor.

  • Method Details

    • accepted

      public void accepted(String actionId)
      Called when an action is accepted into the scheduler.

      Since the scheduler will deduplicate the same action many times, most actions are fated to die quickly. This method will be called to indicate that this instance of the object will actually be used. It is called after prepare() and before perform(ActionServices, Duration, boolean).

      Parameters:
      actionId - the action ID recorded for this action

    • commands

      public Stream<ActionCommand<?>> commands()
      Get the actions that are appropriate for this action
      Returns:
      a stream of commands that the user can perform on this action

    • equals

      public abstract boolean equals(Object other)
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

    • externalTimestamp

      public Optional<Instant> externalTimestamp()
      Get the time this action was last modified outside of Shesmu

      Since actions are associated with an external entity of some kind, get most recent update/event/completion time if available.

      Returns:
      the time or null, if not available

    • generateUUID

      public abstract void generateUUID(Consumer<byte[]> digest)
      Produce a reproducible unique identifier for this action

      It should use the same data as equals(Object)

      Parameters:
      digest - a callback to write bytes into a cryptographic hash; this may be called as many times as required

    • hashCode

      public abstract int hashCode()
      Overrides:

    • perform

      public abstract ActionState perform(ActionServices services, Duration lastGeneratedByOlive, boolean isOliveLive)
      Attempt to complete this action.

      This will be called multiple times until an action returns ActionState.SUCCEEDED or ActionState.ZOMBIE. Because Shesmu is stateless, the action must determine if an equivalent action has already been performed. This object may be recreated since the launch, so the action cannot expect to hold permanent state (e.g., job id) as a field.

      Parameters:
      services - an abstraction to allow action to query information about the server state
      lastGeneratedByOlive - the delay between now and the last time the action was generated by an olive
      isOliveLive - true if the action is connected to an olive or actnow file
      Returns:
      the state of the action; if ActionState.SUCCEEDED or ActionState.ZOMBIE, the action will not be polled again

    • performTimeout

      public Duration performTimeout()
      The amount of time the perform(ActionServices, Duration, boolean) method should be allowed to run for before being interrupted
      Returns:
      the maximum time for the watchdog timer

    • prepare

      public void prepare()
      Perform any preparation needed after parameters have been set.

    • priority

      public abstract int priority()
      A priority for determine which actions should get processed first.

      The actions will be sorted by priority and work in order. Smaller numbers have higher priority. This method should return a constant.

      Returns:
      the priority value

    • purgeCleanup

      public void purgeCleanup()
      If an action is deleted, do any necessary state clean up

    • retryMinutes

      public abstract long retryMinutes()
      The number of minutes to wait before attempting to retry this action.

      If an action has to be re-attempted, the action processor can wait until a certain window expires before it will call perform(ActionServices, Duration, boolean) again. This only sets a lower limit on how frequently an action can be retried; there is no upper limit. This method should return a constant.

      Returns:
      the preferred polling interval

    • search

      public abstract boolean search(Pattern query)
      Check if the action matches the regex query supplied by the user
      Parameters:
      query - the regex to match
      Returns:
      true if the action should be included in the search results

    • tags

      public Stream<String> tags()
      Self-determined tags that should be attached to this action

      An olive may attach tags to an action and an action may also self-determine tags it wants to associate with itself. The tags from olives accumulate, but the self-determined tags are refreshed every time, so an action can choose to drop self-determined tags. This method will be used frequently, so it must be fast.

      Returns:
      A stream of tags

    • toJson

      public abstract com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode toJson(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
      Render the action to JSON for display by the front end.

      It should set the type property.

      Parameters:
      mapper - the JSON mapper instance to use
      Returns:
      a JSON representation of the action

      public final String type()
      The action's name as it will appear in the JSON.
